entry.string: cd ci docker build -t registry.local.test/hello-world -f hello-world/Dockerfile ../hello-world docker push registry.local.test/hello-world kubectl get pods kubectl create -f hello-world/hello-world-deploy.yaml kubectl expose deploy hello-world --port=8080 # wait for pod to come up until curl -s --connect-timeout 1 hello-world.default:8080 &>/dev/null; do sleep 1; done curl -v hello-world.default:8080 kubectl delete -f hello-world/hello-world-deploy.yaml kubectl delete svc hello-world
